title: Test API
description: A simple test API for demonstrating the API documentation system

auth.description: This is a public API - no authentication required for testing

endpoints.title: Get All Posts
endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all blog posts

examples.title: JavaScript
Python
examples.code:
import requests

response = requests.get('https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts', params={'_limit': 5})
posts = response.json()
print(posts)

endpoints.title: Get Post by ID
endpoints.description: Retrieve a single post by its ID

pathParams.name: id
pathParams.description: The ID of the post to retrieve

example.title: sunt aut facere repellat provident occaecati excepturi optio reprehenderit
example.body:
quia et suscipit
suscipit recusandae consequuntur expedita et cum
reprehenderit molestiae ut ut quas totam
nostrum rerum est autem sunt rem eveniet architecto

example.title: My New Post
example.body: This is the content of my new post

example.title: My New Post
example.body: This is the content of my new post

examples.title: cURL
examples.code:
curl -X POST https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "title": "My New Post",
    "body": "This is the content",
    "userId": 1
  }'

examples.title: JavaScript

endpoints.title: Update Post
endpoints.description: Update an existing post (replaces all fields)

pathParams.name: id
pathParams.description: The ID of the post to update

endpoints.title: Partially Update Post
endpoints.description: Partially update a post (only updates provided fields)

pathParams.name: id
pathParams.description: The ID of the post to update

pathParams.name: id
pathParams.description: The ID of the post to delete

endpoints.title: Get Comments for Post
endpoints.description: Retrieve all comments for a specific post
